segments.text: I notice the water just gushing out of the sink, and it makes me so sad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying that plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how much water is just going to waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and the woman is oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever notice the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a slow-motion disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon and realizes what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and it’s so wasteful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the woman; she’s going to have a big mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR
